Vo°，is commonly regarded as the prefix combn vi+ava° （i．e．vi+o°），but in many cases it simply represents ava° （=o°） with v as euphonic （“vorschlag”），as in vonata （=onata），voloketi，vokkanti，vokiṇṇa，voropeti，vosāpeti，vosāna，vossagga．In a few cases it corresponds to vi+ud°，as in vokkamati，vocchijjati，voyoga．（Page 651）
